name: Gold and gold receivables
description: Physical gold i.e. bars, coins, plates, nuggets in storage or ‘under way’. Nonphysical gold, such as balances in gold sight accounts (unallocated accounts), term deposits and claims to receive gold arising from the following transactions: upgrading or downgrading transactions and gold location or purity swaps where there is a difference of more than one business day between release and receipt.
